name: compose-lang
description: An English-based, structured programming language designed for LLM-assisted code generation

scripts.test: node tests/compiler/lexer.test.js && node tests/compiler/parser.test.js && node tests/compiler/analyzer.test.js && node tests/compiler/ir.test.js && node tests/compiler/emitter.test.js
scripts.example: node -e "import('./compiler/index.js').then(c => { const fs = require('fs'); const source = fs.readFileSync('./examples/customer.compose', 'utf8'); const ast = c.compile(source, 'customer.compose'); console.log(JSON.stringify(ast, null, 2)); })"
